subject: Re: [PATCH 13/13] VFS: unexport lock_rename(), lock_rename_child(), unlock_rename()

reviews.author: NeilBrown (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer NeilBrown raised no specific technical concerns about the patch, but instead provided context and clarification for other patches in the series.

reviews.author: Amir Goldstein
reviews.summary: Reviewer Amir Goldstein raised concerns about the patch series, specifically questioning the need for a new lock in ovl_create_real() and suggesting improvements to kernel-doc comments.

reviews.author: Jeff Layton
reviews.summary: Jeff Layton reviewed all patches in the series and gave Reviewed-by tags to most of them, indicating he found no major issues. However, in one patch (PATCH 04/13), he pointed out a minor problem that needs fixing.
